=========================

ID: C1J04ZN_00
From: One Reach <OneReach@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-09-03 18:00
Subject: Incident Resolved Notification: Email Functionality Issue
--------------------------------------------------
 

 

 

 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

 

Dear Colleague,

 

We are pleased to inform you that the previously communicated Email Functionality Issue has now been resolved, and all services are restored.

 

Issue Summary:

*	Email supported functions such as network scanning and report delivery were not working or were delayed.

 

Business Impact:

*	Network printers and scanners wouldn't work.
*	Mail notification using email relay was delayed.

 

Start Date and Time: Wed, 3 Sep 12:23 PM

End Date and Time: Wed, 3 Sep 5:20 PM


For support during this period, please raise a ticket via OneReach. You can also check real-time status updates via the Tech&Data System Status & Health <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/>  Dashboard.

 

 

 

This mail was sent to you by

 <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/support/home>
